events.name: Breakthrough Metagrating Tech Filters Light with Unprecedented Precision—A Game Changer for Advanced Imaging
events.description: Scientists build a "metagrating" filter that selects light by both wavelength and angle—unlocking next-gen AR, sensors, and imaging.

generated_content.title: Historical Mysteries in Did, Ilovik - Tours & Services
generated_content.description: Explore the alleged UFO landing site of Did, Ilovik, a remote location in North Macedonia known for its mysterious history and unexplained phenomena. Visit the nearby town of Stobi, home to ancient ruins and historical significance.
